title: Ada painting notebook
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  Paintings catalogue FSCI
text:
Objective: Make a selection paintings for the exhibition catalogue to be selected from Wikidata and rendered multi-format in Quarto.
The below Python code uses SPARQLWrapper to retrieve data from Wikidata based on a SPARQL query.
{‘painting’: {‘type’: ‘uri’, ‘value’: ‘http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q104412992’}, ‘creatorLabel’: {‘xml:lang’: ‘en’, ‘type’: ‘literal’, ‘value’: ‘William Guy Wall’}, ‘image’: {‘type’: ‘uri’, title: 2  Paintings catalogue - benchmark
text:
Objective: Make a selection of nine paintings for the exhibition catalogue to be selected from Wikidata and rendered multi-format in Quarto.
The below Python code uses SPARQLWrapper to retrieve data from Wikidata based on a SPARQL query.
Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q29474642
Title: The Birth of Benjamin
Year: 1650
Creator: Francesco Furini
Copyright: public domain

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q29474644
Title: Venetian Gala Concert
Year: 1782
Creator: Francesco Guardi
Copyright: public domain

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q29474645
Title: Q29474645
Year: 1789
Creator: Francesco Guardi
Copyright: public domain

title: 3  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 4  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.

title: References
text:
Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput.
J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.
